title: Geometry Shapes and Attributes

vocab.definition: A closed shape made of straight lines
The corner points where two sides of a shape meet
The straight sides of a shape
A flat surface on a 3D shape
When one half of a shape matches the other half exactly

teachingNotes: Use shape manipulatives to explore 2D and 3D shapes. Count vertices, edges, and faces. Introduce symmetry using mirrors or folding paper. Compare and classify shapes by their attributes.

sample.question: How many vertices does a triangle have?

truefalse.question: A square has 4 equal sides and 4 vertices.
